title: Are there any haunted houses in the Wilmington area?  I\'m talking more of the walk through houses, not a historical haunted house.  I\'ve done the ghost walk, but want something that is more theatrical.  Up North the local theaters or school drama classes will turn a building into a haunted house for the Halloween season.
